thread.title: Hadid flaunts her toned abs during NYFW
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid flaunts her toned abs during NYFW | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.com
title: Hadid flaunts her toned abs during NYFW
text:
Gigi Hadid is in impressively great shape.
When stepping out in New York City on Thursday, the blonde Vogue model showed off a six pack tummy with a crop top.
The girlfriend of Zayn Malik has been working out nonstop since she began modeling several years ago. That's probably because when the LA native first looked for an agent, she was told she had to 'lose a lot of weight.'
Her abs are fab: Gigi Hadid is in impressively great shape. When stepping out in New York City on Thursday, the blonde Vogue model showed off a six pack tummy with a crop top
Sporty Spice: The sister of model Bella Hadid wore a cropped grey mock turtleneck that looked like she cut it herself. Over that was a cream colored silk bomber jacket
The sister of model Bella Hadid wore a cropped grey mock turtleneck that looked like she cut it herself.
Over that was a cream colored silk bomber jacket.
Beige sweatpants looked comfortable on the 21-year-old boxing fanatic.
Sleek: The siren had her famous blonde locks pulled back and wore very large dark sunglasses
So Melrose Avenue: The star added an edgy vibe with white and black lace up boots with thick soles
Back in the day: Gigi in 2012 at age 16
The siren had her famous blonde locks pulled back and wore very large dark sunglasses.
The star added an edgy vibe with white and black lace up boots with thick soles.
And the beauty reminded everyone she is all about high-end fashion as she flashed her Gucci cell phone cover.
In the summer of 2015 she told an Australian publication she had a rough start with modeling.
'When I first went to visit different agencies in New York, a lot of them were like, you have to lose a lot of weight,' Gigi said nearly two years ago.
'I would cry at night and my mom [Yolanda Foster] would be like, "We're going to find the [right] people".'
She wasn't about to compromise on her curves however, and after signing with IMG Models, the blonde bombshell was determined to not allow the paradigms of the game to make her change who she is.
'It's funny because once you start to embrace what you have it starts to be what you're known for,' she muses.
'I'm kind of the model that everyone thought would always be the Guess, Sports Illustrated girl, then when I started to do high fashion stuff... people were like, "Oh so we can have a girl with like thighs and a butt in a Tom Ford campaign, cool."
Perfection: In the summer of 2015 she said, 'When I first went to visit different agencies in New York, a lot of them were like, you have to lose a lot of weight,' Gigi said nearly two years ago.' At Tommy Hilfiger in LA last week
A hit on the catwalk: Modeling for Anna Sui on Wednesday (left) and for Jeremy Scott last week (right)
Her sister: Gigi seen with Bella Hadid at the Anna Suit event
'And then all of a sudden the high fashion people wanted to work with me and that's kind of how it works, if you just embrace yourself other people accept you in the same way.
Refusing to waste away she adds: 'Once I started modelling one of my things was like yeah, I don't need to be a man volleyball player but I also don't want to be like [holds up her little finger] two pounds soaking wet.
'And that's always something that I was very strong minded about, I just want to be a healthy role model and I haven't swayed from that at all.'
Her heart: The daughter of Yolanda Hadid is dating Zayn Malik who used to be with One Direction
